group_1.textLeft: So what became of the sacred tree?

group_1.textRight: It seems they've truly abandoned their plans…
For whatever reason, Lord Sumiya fully@believes in the spirits of Mizuna now.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*

group_1.textRight: You seem to know something about this.
What have you done, Tsuyu…? If you've made@even the slightest misstep, we'll suffer for it…

group_1.textLeft: Erm…
I have no idea where to begin…

group_1.textRight: Then walk us through one step at a time.

group_1.textLeft: …Very well.
You won't believe it, but I've now become@a Battle Shamaness.

group_1.textRight: A Battle Shamaness…?
You can't be serious…!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it is just as you told me when@I was small, Gen'un.
I've taken on the duty of fighting Demons,@bestowed with a power beyond reckoning.
In exchange, I received one wish.

group_1.textRight: And that was…

group_1.textLeft: Yes…I wished to protect the sacred tree.

group_1.textRight: And now Lord Sumiya has suddenly come@to believe in the ancestral spirits…

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that's…a little more complicated.

group_1.textRight: Please explain.

group_1.textLeft: Although I was told that my wish had come true,@I couldn't believe it until I saw for myself…

group_1.textRight: …So in slaying the Demons that had afflicted@his clansmen,
you saved Lord Sumiya's life…

group_1.textLeft: Yes, but it was so dark that he didn't recognize@it was me.

group_1.textRight: This actually makes a lot of sense.

group_1.textLeft: That Sumiya believes in our ancestral curse?

group_1.textRight: Actually, Sumiya does not believe@in the Lady of Mizuna's haunting.

group_1.textLeft: Then…what does he believe?

group_1.textRight: He believes in the Lady of Mizuna's salvation.
It's just as it says.
The ancestral spirits did not curse@Lord Sumiya, but saved him instead.

group_1.textLeft: So in saving Lord Sumiya, I saved the sacred@tree as well.

group_1.textRight: Correct.
So it was not that the wish was granted,@but that you granted it yourself…?
Karma works in mysterious ways.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*

group_1.textRight: What are you laughing about…?
…Before I go, I'd like to see for myself.

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: I still can't quite believe that you're a Battle@Shamaness.
I'd like to see you transform before my eyes,@in accordance with the temple's stories.

group_1.textLeft: Do you believe me now?

group_1.textRight: …Yes, I believe you.
Mizuna's strength has now grown@a hundredfold.
I fear what would happen if another woman@matching that strength were to appear.

group_1.textLeft: Don't bring ill fortune on us.
I shall pray such a thing never comes to pass.

group_1.textCenter: I never imagined I would avenge the dead...
